review: Fellas, you really nailed it on this one! This is a great product, hands down. Network usage is minimal and excellent, with content I'm only now beginning to explore. Being able to dial up something on our Kindle Fire and then simultaneously bring it up on the TV is one step closer to all device simul-play that I'm hoping for. This will bring back the Drive-In movie with a little development.It was pretty cool having the MayDay guy come thru the kindle  to walk us thru the simultaneous setup.One of the best products I've laid hands on, period. And I've got some pretty cool toys.
author: Gwaltney
